title: Did Trump say, " Obama should leave the office'before appointing a Supreme Court judge?
subtitle: In September 2020, United States President Donald Trump undertook to nominate a successor to Judge Ruth Bader Jensburg.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In April 2016, Donald Trump said that the then President of the United States, Obama, should "wait until he leaves his post to choose another judge" after the death of Judge Antonin Scalya.
